On June 18th 2019 a bunch of designers came together at the Universty of Applied Sciences ans Arts in Dortmun, Germany to create this FIELD MANUAL FOR SIMBLE SABOTAGE.
They were joined by Patrick Thomas, who initiated the open collab project.
